label: clinical_signal_03_dx_vaccine_immunogenicity_004
content:
## 2024-03-25 Daily Operations Summary

### Enrollment
- Total Enrolled: 80
- Active: 80
- Screen Failures Cumulative: 6
- Withdrawals Cumulative: 0

### Enrollment by Dose Group
- Low Dose: 20
- Mid Dose: 21
- High Dose: 20
- Placebo: 19

### Immunogenicity By Group
- Low Dose
  - IgG Titer (GMU) Mean: 32.6
  - IgG Titer (GMU) SD: 6.0
  - IgM Titer (GMU) Mean: 16.9
  - IgM Titer (GMU) SD: 4.0
  - Neutralizing Ab ID50 Mean: 46.4
  - Neutralizing Ab ID50 SD: 10.0
  - CD4 Response (SFC per 10e6) Mean: 85.0
  - CD4 Response (SFC per 10e6) SD: 15.0
  - CD8 Response (SFC per 10e6) Mean: 54.0
  - CD8 Response (SFC per 10e6) SD: 11.0
  - Seroconversion Percentage: 12.1
- Mid Dose
  - IgG Titer (GMU) Mean: 52.1
  - IgG Titer (GMU) SD: 9.6
  - IgM Titer (GMU) Mean: 25.3
  - IgM Titer (GMU) SD: 6.4
  - Neutralizing Ab ID50 Mean: 80.7
  - Neutralizing Ab ID50 SD: 16.0
  - CD4 Response (SFC per 10e6) Mean: 120.0
  - CD4 Response (SFC per 10e6) SD: 24.0
  - CD8 Response (SFC per 10e6) Mean: 90.0
  - CD8 Response (SFC per 10e6) SD: 18.0
  - Seroconversion Percentage: 19.6
- High Dose
  - IgG Titer (GMU) Mean: 71.3
  - IgG Titer (GMU) SD: 13.2
  - IgM Titer (GMU) Mean: 33.2
  - IgM Titer (GMU) SD: 8.8
  - Neutralizing Ab ID50 Mean: 122.2
  - Neutralizing Ab ID50 SD: 22.0
  - CD4 Response (SFC per 10e6) Mean: 178.0
  - CD4 Response (SFC per 10e6) SD: 33.0
  - CD8 Response (SFC per 10e6) Mean: 121.0
  - CD8 Response (SFC per 10e6) SD: 24.0
  - Seroconversion Percentage: 25.2
- Placebo
  - IgG Titer (GMU) Mean: 11.3
  - IgG Titer (GMU) SD: 1.2
  - IgM Titer (GMU) Mean: 0.7
  - IgM Titer (GMU) SD: 0.8
  - Neutralizing Ab ID50 Mean: 8.0
  - Neutralizing Ab ID50 SD: 2.0
  - CD4 Response (SFC per 10e6) Mean: 25.0
  - CD4 Response (SFC per 10e6) SD: 3.0
  - CD8 Response (SFC per 10e6) Mean: 10.0
  - CD8 Response (SFC per 10e6) SD: 2.0
  - Seroconversion Percentage: 0.9

### Injection Site Reactions
- Pain Percentage: 53.7
- Erythema Percentage: 12.6
- Swelling Percentage: 17.6
- Induration Percentage: 4.4
- Mean Pain Duration (Hours): 18.8

### Systemic Reactogenicity
- Fever Percentage: 19.9
- Fatigue Percentage: 38.1
- Myalgia Percentage: 30.2
- Headache Percentage: 27.5
- Chills Percentage: 10.1

### Safety Labs
- WBC (K) Mean: 7.1
- WBC (K) SD: 1.3
- Lymphocyte Percentage Mean: 32.0
- Lymphocyte Percentage SD: 5.2
- Neutrophil Percentage Mean: 63.7
- Neutrophil Percentage SD: 5.4
- Platelets (K) Mean: 218
- Platelets (K) SD: 41
- CRP (mg/L) Mean: 7.7
- CRP (mg/L) SD: 1.9
- Hemoglobin (g/dL) Mean: 14.2
- Hemoglobin (g/dL) SD: 1.2

### Adverse Events
- AE ID: VI-AE-0417, Description: lymphadenopathy, Grade: 2, Relatedness: related, Resolved: true, Dose Group: low_dose
- AE ID: VI-AE-0429, Description: nausea, Grade: 1, Relatedness: possibly related, Resolved: true, Dose Group: low_dose
- AE ID: VI-AE-0425, Description: malaise, Grade: 2, Relatedness: possibly related, Resolved: true, Dose Group: high_dose

### Events
- Vaccination day 1: 21 subjects received scheduled dose
- Immunology core lab QC report received

### Notes
- Week 4: Immunogenicity assessments on schedule. 80 subjects enrolled across dose groups. Reactogenicity profiles consistent with prior weeks.
